text:
Check out last week’s post here . The reviews for this post have been edited for length and clarity. 
ID: 10621301 Do you have half an hour to help us out? View this image › 
CBS We love helping BuzzFeed readers find the best gifts, products, and gadgets around — but we need your help to make shopping with BuzzFeed the best experience possible! We’re looking for volunteers to talk with us about their shopping habits and how BuzzFeed can make your shopping experience even better. It will only take 30 minutes, and you can do it from wherever you’re located!
If you’re interested in helping us out, please send us your contact information here . Thanks, and happy shopping!
